description: I've been making this dessert for many years on the same enamel pie plate & I think that's my secret. Everyone just loves the sweet & tangy flavours.
name: Tangy Lemon Meringue Pie Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 lemon, juiced and rind finely grated
2 eggs, yolks split out (save whites for meringue)

recipeInstructions.text: Gather ingredients and preheat oven to 180 deg fan.
Mix butter and sugar together well, add the egg and beat well together. Sift in SR Flour and add milk. Mix together well to form pastry. Turn onto floured surface.
Knead together with a little flour and roll out to fit size of pie plate. Pick up with rolling pin.
Place evenly onto pie plate. Fork it all over to stop it rising so much.
Bake in preheated oven for approx. 25 minutes until cooked.

While pastry is cooking prepare the lemon mixture. In a saucepan place the sugar, cornflour, lemon juice and rind of lemons, egg yolks. Combine this all together well. Boil the kettle and add the boiling water to lemon mix and stir well on the stove top continuously until thickened. (about 3 to 4 minutes) Turn the heat down as you go so the bottom doesn't "catch" on the bottom. Pour onto pastry base.

Whip the egg whites and castor sugar together until fluffy & forms stiff peaks. Pile onto lemon mixture and bake in a cooler oven 150 deg fan for approx 15 min. Remove from oven and place on wire rack to cool. Enjoy with cream!
